PopBallad

Plain old Pop Ballad. (4)
Arpeggio Atmosphere
Bass AcousticBass
Chord Piano2
Drum-Cabasa Cabasa
Drum-Cym CrashCymbal1
Drum-Hh ClosedHiHat
Drum-Kick KickDrum1
Drum-Shake Shaker
Drum-Snare SnareDrum1
